comment: been very patient but app remains limited considering the cost

reply.author: John Li
reply.content: You can use App Builder to build simple link Page App, or use the build-in Actions (Phone Call, Send SMS and more is coming soon).  App Builder also can help you quickly mockup and run your App demo.

author: ricky bell
comment: Disappointed I payed £6. Including £3 in app as I like building apps. But don't work. Money back please or impress me with an update. 1 star til then.
